summary: Adds 4 new companions of the Ashen race.
descriptionHtml:
Adds 4 new companions to join your adventures. Includes

Leon Lockheart - Greatsword user
Iris Lockheart - Sword and Shield user
Elira Lockheart - Dagger and bow user
Clarissa Lockheart - Mage

All are not over powered and level with you as you progress. 

Where to find:
Leon, Elira and Clarissa can all be found at the Drunken huntsman in whiterun. Iris is on a separate location, since she is the latest addition, and made her exactly like my own character. Iris can be found at Jorrvaskr - Where the companions reside. 

Note: This is my first companions mod. I have no Idea how it will work for you but surely it did for me. 

Extract CBBE meshes and textures to the Oriental race folder. If you dont know where that is the path is Data/Meshes/Actors/Character/ORIENTAL/Body (same path with textures). This is required since Ashen is a custom race, Meshes and textures from CBBE might not work. You need to put the required files in the Ashen/Oriental race folder itself. 


Required mods:
Apachii sky hair
The Ashen Race - CBBE compatible: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/8583
CBBE V3 (Slim) - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666
Turndown X race - for the hair and ears
Smooth faces for men -http://skyrimbox.blog.fc2.com/blog-entry-42.html

Recommended:
Enhanced character edit
better face gen
Triss armor retextured
author: fullm3tal2
